abilities.description: Target an enemy, ally or self. Cause the target to become untargetable but also silenced, muted and disarmed for 3 seconds. Applies basic dispell.
itemBehaviour:
(Spell_immunity_block_partial_symbol)^Partially pierces spell immunity
Can be cast on self while spell immune
Cannot be cast on other spell immune units.

name: Book of Shadows
description: An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.
